items.sentence: Tom and Mary are having a barbecue party next weekend.
Tom went to school even though he wasn't feeling well.
I'll leave no stone unturned to find out who did this.
I'll fix you something to eat while you take a shower.
I'll lend you the book as soon as I'm done reading it.
I'll have to tell my boss that I won't be in tomorrow.
Mary must've been very beautiful when she was younger.
Mary was one of the most popular girls in high school.
Hard work never killed anyone. But why take the risk?!
Tom is afraid he might do something that he'll regret.
